### Usage

```yaml
- uses: SeraphicSecurity/browsertotal-github-action@v[VERSION]
  with:
    browser: chrome
    output-format: both
    comment-on-pr: true
```

### Upgrading

If upgrading from a previous version:

```yaml
# Old
- uses: SeraphicSecurity/browsertotal-github-action@v[OLD_VERSION]

# New
- uses: SeraphicSecurity/browsertotal-github-action@v[VERSION]
```
